alert.note: Alert for Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorm southeast of the Black Mountain fire working slowly towards the fire through 245 PM MDT... At 142 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 16 miles west of Oakley Reservoir, moving slowly northwest toward the Black Mountain Fire. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could create difficult conditions for fire fighters. Locations impacted include... Bostetter Ranger Station and Black Mountain Fire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Fire crews working near active fires should prepare for strong, gusty and erratic thunderstorm outflow winds that may increase fire behavior.
